artist: Engraver: Hanksworth; Artist: After Correggio (Antonio Allegri)
description: engraving of Correggio's Madonna and Child; seated woman holding child; man working in background right; bound in Bryans Dictionary, vol.1
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [Correggio\'s/ Madonna and Child/ Engraved by Hawksworth from the Celebrated Picture/ in the National Gallery Pall Mall/ London, Published by Sherwood Gilbert and Piper, Paternoster Row Nov. 17 1825]; on sheet in pencil below plate: [1-17]; on verso in pencil upper right corner: [46]
title: Madonna and Child
